Package lib.homies.framework.scheduler

Interface SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder

Enclosing interface:
SchedulerService
public static interface SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
Builder interface for constructing and scheduling tasks with various options.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    async()
    Configures the task to run asynchronously (off the main server thread).
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    delay(long ticks)
    Sets an initial delay for the task before its first execution.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    group(String group)
    Assigns the task to a named group, allowing for group-based cancellation.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    repeat(long ticks)
    Configures the task to repeat with a specified period.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    run(Runnable runnable)
    Sets the Runnable to be executed by the task.
    HomiesTask
    start()
    Builds and starts the scheduled task.

  • Method Details

    • run

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder run(Runnable runnable)
      Sets the Runnable to be executed by the task.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The task logic.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • async

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder async()
      Configures the task to run asynchronously (off the main server thread).
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • delay

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder delay(long ticks)
      Sets an initial delay for the task before its first execution.
      Parameters:
      ticks - The delay in server ticks.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • repeat

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder repeat(long ticks)
      Configures the task to repeat with a specified period.
      Parameters:
      ticks - The period between executions in server ticks.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • group

      SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder group(String group)
      Assigns the task to a named group, allowing for group-based cancellation.
      Parameters:
      group - The name of the task group.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • start

      HomiesTask start()
      Builds and starts the scheduled task.
      Returns:
      A HomiesTask representing the newly scheduled task.
